info.title: Slack Reactions API
info.description: The API for management Slack Reactionss

get.summary: Adds a reaction to an item.
get.description: Adds a reaction to an item.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel where the message to add reaction to was posted.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to add reaction to.

parameters.name: file_comment
parameters.description: File comment to add reaction to.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to add reaction to.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: reactions:write)

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel where the message to get reactions for was posted.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to get reactions for.

parameters.name: file_comment
parameters.description: File comment to get reactions for.

parameters.name: full
parameters.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to get reactions for.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: reactions:read)

get.summary: Lists reactions made by a user.
get.description: Lists reactions made by a user.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: full
parameters.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: reactions:read)

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Show reactions made by this user. Defaults to the authed user.

get.summary: Removes a reaction from an item.
get.description: Removes a reaction from an item.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel where the message to remove reaction from was posted.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to remove reaction from.

parameters.name: file_comment
parameters.description: File comment to remove reaction from.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Reaction (emoji) name.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to remove reaction from.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: reactions:write)
